entities.name: weasleys
entities.description: The Weasley family is mentioned as having a room where Fred and George invent joke items.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is one of the twins who invents joke items in their room.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is one of the twins who invents joke items in their room.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as having seen the Weasley twins' inventions and is surprised by how much they have created.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is Ron's sister and is also aware of the Weasley twins' inventions.

entities.name: hogwarts
entities.description: Hogwarts is mentioned as a place where the Weasley twins plan to sell their inventions.

entities.name: o.w.l.s
entities.description: O.W.L.s are examinations taken by Hogwarts students at the age of fifteen.

relationships.description: Ron visited the Weasley twins' room and saw their inventions.
Ginny is aware of the Weasley twins' inventions.
Fred and George are twins who invent joke items together.
The Weasley twins planned to sell their inventions at Hogwarts.
Mum disapproved of Fred and George's inventions and burned the order forms.
